name: Makin Biscuits
description:
Welcome to Charlie’s Bakery! Help some cats! Bake some cakes!! 

Makin Biscuits is a short, no-pressure browser game that combines visual novel and adventure game elements. 

Playtime is approximately 30 min

Tips: 

-Powdered Sugar is in the green bowl 

-Egg Whites are in the clear bowl

-Cream cheese is on the purple plate

Thanks for playing!
